Title: Writing C for curl
Description: It is a somewhat common question to me: how do we write C in curl to make it safe and secure for billions of installations? Some precautions we take and decisions we make. Title: On .NET Live - Data API Builder Transforms the Way You Build APIs
Description:
Looking for a better way to do Create-Read-Update-Delete (CRUD) APIs? In this week's episode, community MVP Sander ten Brinke joins the panel to show us how Data API Builder is a game changer for building APIs.
